inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of acromegaly over 1 year ago
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No changes in treatment schedule since at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is willing to participate and has signed the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: All untreated endocrine disorders including uncontrolled diabetes mellitus type 2
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Bariatric surgery; malabsorptive syndromes; hepatic or renal failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current medication use: insulin, metformin, sulfonylurea, fibrates, incretin mimetics, dopamine agonists
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Weight changes > 10% of body weight during preceding 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly and underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He is currently taking vitamin D and multivitamins.
